title: Moderate alcohol consumption linked with high blood pressure

title_detail.value: Moderate alcohol consumption linked with high blood pressure

summary: A study of more than 17,000 US adults shows that moderate alcohol consumption -- seven to 13 drinks per week -- substantially raises one's risk of high blood pressure, or hypertension, according to new research.

summary_detail.value: A study of more than 17,000 US adults shows that moderate alcohol consumption -- seven to 13 drinks per week -- substantially raises one's risk of high blood pressure, or hypertension, according to new research.
